categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: An individual was the first Padawan of Jedi Knight Daakman Barrek. Barrek successfully trained this Padawan to Knighthood and soon after achieved the rank of Jedi Master. However, the Knight was killed at the outbreak of the Clone Wars during a battle on the planet Geonosis.
The Padawan was first mentioned in StarWars.com's Databank entry on Master Barrek.
